# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection, and I understand its worth to you is around $100. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I am offering it to you for $125. This price reflects its true worth while also allowing me to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
